sentence: Catherine Davis (R), a frequent candidate for office, takes 5 percent of the vote; Kandiss Taylor (R), a teacher who ran for a U.S. Senate seat in 2020, would claim 2 percent.
title: Kemp, Raffensperger lead Trump-backed challengers in Georgia: poll

sentence: Third-place candidate Kandiss Taylor received four percent, and 15 percent of respondents said they were undecided.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Georgia Poll: Kemp Widens Lead over Perdue in Governor's Primary
